lead_paragraph: Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew on Wednesday will hail the success of economic sanctions against Iran and others, but warn against their overuse.

headline.print_headline: Lew Defends Sanctions, but Cautions on Overuse
headline.main: Lew Defends Sanctions, but Cautions on Overuse

snippet: Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew on Wednesday will hail the success of economic sanctions against Iran and others, but warn against their overuse.
abstract: Treasury Sec Jacob J Lew says in interview and in prepared remarks for speech at Carnegie Endowment for International Peace that economic sanctions against Iran and other countries have been effective during Pres Obama's tenure; Lew warns that using sanctions too frequently can lead to negative consequences for dollar and world economy; comments are response to criticism, largely from Republicans, who oppose lifting of Iranian sanctions.
